name: The Dictater
description:
What’s all the russet outside? It’s an upfrising, glorious and spudpream leader!! They’re tatering control of everything and trying to run you out of power!

Left Click on the red areas to mash out the upfrising there. You’ll only win if you can mash out all of them and regain complete control. Your Spudies (in green) will help you take control of the upfrised areas, while the instataters (in red) will try to keep control of the upfrised areas!

Can you regain your power over your spuds and rule as the one true Dictater?
